channel.title: Against the Dark Conspiracy - Into the Dark
channel.description:
4 sessions of modern supernatural thriller action in March, on Sundays at 2pm (GMT ... but watch for the clock change) ... Against the Dark Conspiracy is taxi-ing to the runway for launch on Feb 11th as part of ZineQuest ... https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/atdc/against-the-dark-conspiracy-zinequest-3
![Combined title and team 05|690x388](upload://83PclovgLzKCA8THEDC5QYCirLn.jpeg)

item.title: Against the Dark Conspiracy - Into the Dark
item.dc:creator: @Alun_R
item.description:
@Alun_R wrote:

4 sessions of modern supernatural thriller action in March, on Sundays at 2pm (GMT … but watch for the clock change) … Against the Dark Conspiracy is taxi-ing to the runway for launch on Feb 11th as part of ZineQuest …

Kickstarter

Coming soon: Against the Dark Conspiracy - ZineQuest 3

A tabletop roleplaying game in which competent characters confront a shadowy supernatural conspiracy and its venal human pawns.

Combined title and team 051280×720 345 KB
